Detailed Description

todo: write tests for diffusion subroutine in case of Neumann BC at the left and Dirichlet BC at the right side

Test of transport convergence diffusion subjected to cubic decay for a single channel

real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

Diffusion matrix values for nonlinear decay test imposes Dirichlet boundaries at both ends of the channel.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]down_diagValues of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
[in,out]center_diagValues of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]up_diagValues of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
[in,out]right_hand_sideValues of the coefficients of right hand side vector
[in]concConcentration
[in]explicit_diffuse_opExplicit diffusive operator
[in]areaCell centered area at new time
[in]area_loLow side area at new time
[in]area_hiHigh side area at new time
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]thetaExplicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step
subroutine test_diffusion_nonlinear_decay::dirichlet_diffusive_nonlinear_flux ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(inout)  diffusive_flux_lo,

Diffusive flux that imposes Dirichlet boundaries at both ends of the channel for nonlinear decay test.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in,out]diffusive_flux_loFace flux, lo side
[in,out]diffusive_flux_hiFace flux, hi side
[in]area_loLow side area centered at time
[in]area_hiHigh side area centered at time
[in]timeTime
[in]concConcentration
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef.
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef.

[in]dxSpatial step

integer, intent(in)  nx_base,
integer, intent(in)  nconc 
)

produce fine initial condition and reference solution

Parameters:
[in]nx_baseNumber of cells in the finest grid
[in]nconcNumber of constituents
[out]fine_initial_concInitial condition at finest resolution
[out]fine_solutionReference solution at finest resolution
[in]init_timeInitial time
[in]dispersion_coefDispersion coefficient (m2/s)
[in]lambdaConstant of cubic decay rate
[in]total_timeTotal time
[in]originOrigin
[in]domain_lengthDomain length
